jd: From: Salman, VYZE INC salman.khan@vyzeinc.com Reply to: salman.khan@vyzeinc.com Title : Intermediate BAClient : University of MichiganLocation: Hybrid, local to Ann Arbor, MI.Duration : 6+ MonthVisa: USC onlyMOI: Video Rate $40-/hr Max Note: This is not going to be an Agile Scrum environment so someone strong in that area will not be happy on this project.They do use the Google Suite of tools so she would like them to be familiar with that and they also use Lucid Charts so having that experience is ideal and they are starting to use smart sheets so that is also going to be good to have knowledge of. ……please make sure these things are in the resume and you touch on them in your summary…….along with all of their process re-engineering experience. Capture and gather critical requirements from project stakeholders through meetings or team discussions.Analyze, prioritize, and present these requirements to aid in decision-making and recommendations.Perform independent research and peer benchmarking to meet deliverables.Evaluate potential technical tools or options, document findings, and present insights to the team.Facilitate discussions to create process maps and business requirements.Document and review current processes to help develop future plans, troubleshoot, and identify fit gapsCreate technical documentation, including training materials and test plans,Conduct survey analysis to convert raw data into actionable insights.Document business processes, data, and reporting requirements, and identify opportunities for system improvements.
